content: Restoration of Judah
But the  will have compassion on Jacob and will again choose Israel, and will set them in their own land; and aliens will join them and attach themselves to the house of Jacob.

And the nations will take them and bring them to their place, and the house of Israel will possess the nations as male and female slaves in the ’s land; they will take captive those who were their captors, and rule over those who oppressed them.
Downfall of the King of Babylon
When the  has given you rest from your pain and turmoil and the hard service with which you were made to serve,
you will take up this taunt against the king of Babylon:
How the oppressor has ceased!
The  has broken the staff of the wicked,
that struck down the peoples in wrath
that ruled the nations in anger
The whole earth is at rest and quiet;
The cypresses exult over you,
“Since you were laid low,
Sheol beneath is stirred up
it rouses the shades to greet you,
it raises from their thrones
All of them will speak
“You too have become as weak as we!
Your pomp is brought down to Sheol,
maggots are the bed beneath you,
I will rise up against them, says the  of hosts, and will cut off from Babylon name and remnant, offspring and posterity, says the .
And I will make it a possession of the hedgehog, and pools of water, and I will sweep it with the broom of destruction, says the  of hosts.
An Oracle concerning Assyria
The  of hosts has sworn:
As I have designed,
and as I have planned,
I will break the Assyrian in my land,
his yoke shall be removed from them,
This is the plan that is planned
and this is the hand that is stretched out
For the  of hosts has planned,
His hand is stretched out,
An Oracle concerning Philistia
In the year that King Ahaz died this oracle came:
